title: A Gaming Notebook To Rule Them All?  MSI GT76 TITAN!
description: The MSI GT76 Titan looks like the perfect gaming notebook for people searching out a desktop replacement laptop.  It features desktop-class hardware like an overclocked i9-9900K and a ton of other things.  Then there's the GE76 Raider, a well priced high spec 15" gaming notebook that seems to have it all.  A special thanks to Steelseries and Phanteks.  Without them, our Computex 2019 trip wouldn't have been possible.    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Phanteks and Steelseries. MSI is a minor sponsor of Computex as well.  As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- #gamingnotebook #gt76titan #computex2019 #hardwarecanucks
